messages.subject: other people's kids' parents
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/8/02 3:16:44 PM, homeschoolmd@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/8/02 3:16:44 PM, homeschoolmd@... writes:

<< How about people who put up with abuse from a child's parent to be kind to
the child? >>

Holly has friends whose moms aren't my friends. I have friends whose kids
aren't Holly's friends. Luckily, sometimes there's a whole family our whole
family likes! <g>

When the boys were little, many of our regular play-dates were with families
from La Leche League. Holly's have been more from homeschooling. She's
brave about being at other houses overnight, so I don't have to hang around
just for her to play.

It was more a problem with littler kids.

I'm usually okay if they're just not talking about how to make their kids
finish their math assignments.

Sandra
